description:
The anime's story centers on Akira Kiyose, who sings on a video streaming site under the singer name "KIKUNOYU." One day the talent agency sMiLea Production scouts him. sMiLea is an agency founded by the retired legendary idol pair AneLa to train new budding idols. Akira then forms an idol group with Banri Naoe and Chihiro Isuzugawa, who were also scouted. Their new group, Protostar, will have their debut alongside other new idol groups with sMiLea Production: Legit and Jaxx Jaxx.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Baseball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of baseball.

tags.name: Natural Disaster
tags.description: It focuses on catastrophic events of natural origin, such as earthquakes, tsunamis,  volcanic eruptions, and severe storms. These works often present situations of extreme danger in which the characters struggle to survive and overcome the adversity.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Restaurant
tags.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.
Director of the Finishing Department at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/).

__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)
